Konami Lo‑fi Beats To Chill To is a vinyl LP featuring DJ No. 2’s lo‑fi remixes of classic Konami arcade themes—including Gradius, Yie Ar Kung‑Fu, TwinBee, and Salamander. Released to commemorate the 35th anniversary of the iconic Konami Code, it transforms nostalgic game melodies into mellow, hip‑hop‑inflected soundscapes :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}. The vinyl is pressed with art by Mizucat, capturing a vaporwave‑tinged aesthetic of nighttime cityscapes and chill energy :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}.
